site.title: Val's Creations
site.tagline: VRChat World Creator & Custom Systems Developer
site.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Val's Creations - Your source for premium VRChat content and custom development

commissions.title: Commission Services
commissions.description: I'm a Developer and VRChat mapmaker with 4+ years of experience specializing in the creation of custom scripts and systems, always with performance in mind. I can help you bring your VRChat world ideas to life with custom features tailored to your needs.
commissions.contactText: Interested in working together? Join my Discord server to discuss your project!
